app.FAQ:
FAQ

Do I need to open an Ethereum account to participate in pre-sale/token sale?
No, we create an Ethereum account and will mint tokens to this account after a few days of token sale end.

What if I already have an Ethereum account and want to have RAC tokens on this account?
After token minting you will be able to transfer RAC tokens to any Ethereum account from dashboard.

When will tokens be minted (released)?
Tokens will be minted after the end of the token sale.

What is a schedule of token sale?
Crowdsale of RAcoins (RAC) will be conducted in two stages:
  • pre-sale March 26, 2018 – April 2, 2018
  • token sale: Aprl 28, 2018 – May 28, 2018

Does RAcoins conforms ERC20 standart?
Yes.

Do you have bounty program?
Yes, you can get detailed info at bitcointalk

What payment options do you have?
BTC, ETH

What bonuses can I receive?
Token sale discounts:
  • 1-50 ETH: +5% of RAC
  • 50-100 ETH: +10% of RAC
  • 100 ETH and more: +25% RAC

What limits does token sale have?
5 000 000 000 RAC

How referral program works?
Instead of rewarding you for inviting new participants in tokens, we have a much better proposition: share your referral link among friend and receive 5% of their deposits in original cryptocurrency (BTC of ETH)

Do you have an airdrop?
Yes, fill your personal data in settings section and receive 1000 RACs. You can withdraw airdrop tokens after the end of the token sale (May 29th) if you are a member of the official telegram chat.

What is the address of the smartcontract?
Because of the complicity of the smartcontract we want to discuss it with community. Please check smartcontract's code on GitHub and give your feedback at support@racoin.io or official telegram chat.

dashboard.HTU_BTC:
You need to transfer coins to this wallet number from your personal wallet, multisig wallet or exchange. Press COPY to copy wallet number to the clipboard.

After receiving at least one confirmation of your transaction your balance will be updated within an hour.
dashboard.HTU_ETH:
You need to transfer coins to this wallet number from your personal wallet. Please do not send from multisig wallet or smart contracts and exchanges like Bitstamp, Coinjar. Press COPY to copy wallet number to the clipboard.

After receiving at least one confirmation of your transaction your balance will be updated within an hour.
